text: Gilberto Lozano Cortés (born 27 January 1995) is a Colombian footballer who currently plays as a defender for 1º Dezembro. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan="4"|Deportes Tolima |2014 |rowspan="3"|Categoría Primera A |0||0||1Appearances in the Copa Colombia||0||0||0||1||0 |- |2015 |0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 |- |2016 |0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !0!!0!!1!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0 |- |rowspan="4"|1º Dezembro |2016–17 |rowspan="3"|Campeonato de Portugal |1||0||1Appearances in the Taça de Portugal||0||0||0||1||0 |- |2017–18 |0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 |- |2018–19 |32||1||1||0||0||0||33||1 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !33!!1!!2!!0!!0!!0!!35!!1 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !33!!1!!3!!0!!0!!0!!36!!1 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian footballers Category:Colombian expatriate footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Campeonato de Portugal (league) players Category:Deportes Tolima footballers Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in Portugal Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal
